Reply: Form a daily habit of working on things related to you studying math if you do something everyday you will be obsessed with it. if you want to call it obsession but merely it is the anticipation your brain forms for doing the same thing everyday it’s like the habit of smoking that smokers build their brain is anticipating cigarettes just bc they’re used to smoking everyday

Reply: Set a goal for yourself , for example ask yourself ,how much do I want my basic salary to be? Which people earn that kind of salary?Then plan out in steps how to become the person who can earn that kind of salary. If you need to study but there are gaps in your learning, then start learning the things necessary to get that degree. Take it one day at a time and keep in mind your goal : a certain salaryscale that will allow you to do the things you like to do.This will motivate your daily study  efforts because your working to  become a person who has a higher value in the marketplace. Also don’t tell anyone what your doing.
